description: This veteran guerilla soldier is a member of Dozle Zabi`s Space Attack Force, dispatched to Earth in order to avenge Garma Zabi by destroying the White Base. Cunning and experienced, he proves to be our heroes` toughest opponent yet, but his efforts are undercut by the scheming and feuding of the Zabi family. Ultimately, cut off from supplies or reinforcements, Ramba Ral and his men must resort to launching a suicidal infantry assault on the White Base.
name: Ramba Ral
